original: @ga     @#/_/gnod sbyin mo nag mos bsad🔽pa'i sgrub thabs/ :🔽/ @#/_/rgya gar skad du/_yak+shi ka li ma ra na sa d+ha/_bod skad du/
analyzed: @ga     @#/_/gnod sbyin mo nag mos bsad pa'i sgrub thabs/ : / @#/_/rgya gar skad du/_yak+shi ka li ma ra na sa d+ha/_bod skad du/
translated: The Means of Accomplishment of the Yakṣiṇī Kālīmara🔽In the Indian language: Yakṣī Kālīmara-sādhana

original: gnod sbyin mo nag mos bsad pa'i sgrub thabs/_bcom ldan 'das rdo rje
analyzed: gnod sbyin mo nag mos bsad pa'i sgrub thabs/_bcom ldan 'das rdo rje
translated: In the Tibetan language: The Means of Accomplishment of the Yakṣiṇī Kālīmara🔽Homage to the Blessed One, Vajradhara.

original: 'chang la phyag 'tshhal lo/_/dang por bdag nyid rdo rje 'dzin par bsams te/
analyzed: 'chang la phyag 'tshhal lo/_/dang por bdag nyid rdo rje 'dzin par bsams te/
translated: First, imagine oneself as Vajradhara.

original: mdun du gnod sbyin nag mo sku mdog nag mo/_g.yas pa ral gri bsnams pa/
analyzed: mdun du gnod sbyin nag mo sku mdog nag mo/_g.yas pa ral gri bsnams pa/
translated: In front, imagine a black yakṣiṇī, black in color, holding a sword in the right hand,

original: g.yon pas nad kyi rkyal pa bsnams pa/_na bza' sngon po gsol ba/_kha nas
analyzed: g.yon pas nad kyi rkyal pa bsnams pa/_na bza' sngon po gsol ba/_kha nas
translated: holding a pouch of disease in the left hand, wearing blue garments,

original: khrag dang dug gi kha chu can spyan gsum pa/_ral pas tshha ra'i rtshos po khar slebs🔽pa can cig bsams la/_mdun du khrag sna tshhogs pa dang /_snying sna tshhogs
analyzed: khrag dang dug gi kha chu can spyan gsum pa/_ral pas tshha ra'i rtshos po khar slebs pa can cig bsams la/_mdun du khrag sna tshhogs pa dang /_snying sna tshhogs
translated: with blood and poisonous saliva coming from the mouth, with three eyes, and with hair reaching down to the ears.🔽Having given a bali of various kinds of blood and various kinds of hearts in front, recite this mantra:

original: pa'i gtor ma byin la sngags 'di bzlas so/_/ru ru shad shad kha kham la rtu rtu/
analyzed: pa'i gtor ma byin la sngags 'di bzlas so/_/ru ru shad shad kha kham la rtu rtu/
translated: ru ru śad śad kha kham la tu tu

original: ba sha ma ma kha tam/_tshi ta tshi ta rbad rbad/_ril ril thum ril sod sod/
analyzed: ba sha ma ma kha tam/_tshi ta tshi ta rbad rbad/_ril ril thum ril sod sod/
translated: Ril ril thum ril sod sod🔽Recite at least three hundred thousand times, twenty-one times.

original: sum 'bum nyi shu rtsha gcig las mi nyung bar bzlas so/_/de nas 'brub khung du
analyzed: sum 'bum nyi shu rtsha gcig las mi nyung bar bzlas so/_/de nas 'brub khung du
translated: Then, in the charnel ground pit

original: dgra'i zag pas chag chag byas la/_gru gsum bsnol ma cig khrag gis bri/_de
analyzed: dgra'i zag pas chag chag byas la/_gru gsum bsnol ma cig khrag gis bri/_de
translated: sprinkle with the victim's urine, draw a three-sided crossed-vajra with blood,🔽and place the effigy of the victim in the center.

original: gnod sbyin mo nag mos bsad pa'i sgrub thabs/
analyzed: gnod sbyin mo nag mos bsad pa'i sgrub thabs/
translated: The sādhana of killing by the black yakṣiṇī

original: nas khyi mo dkar mo'i grod par khrag sna snyed tshhad/_phag khra mo'i khrag_/ra rgya
analyzed: nas khyi mo dkar mo'i grod par khrag sna snyed tshhad/_phag khra mo'i khrag_/ra rgya
translated: is as follows: In the stomach of a white bitch, mix blood, various grains,🔽the blood of a spotted pig, the blood of a female goat,

original: mo'i khrag_/khyi mo'i khrag_/dgra bo'i ming rus ling ga dang bcas pa/_dgra
analyzed: mo'i khrag_/khyi mo'i khrag_/dgra bo'i ming rus ling ga dang bcas pa/_dgra
translated: the blood of a bitch, the name and life-force of the enemy,

original: bo'i pha mes kyi sha rus phye ma blugs la/_man+dal khar rang la kha bstan la bzhag_/
analyzed: bo'i pha mes kyi sha rus phye ma blugs la/_man+dal khar rang la kha bstan la bzhag_/
translated: and the ground-up flesh and bones of the enemy's ancestors. Place it on the maṇḍala facing oneself.

original: de nas re'u 'am bra ba byi ba'i rkyal par nyungs kar la sngags btab la blugs la/
analyzed: de nas re'u 'am bra ba byi ba'i rkyal par nyungs kar la sngags btab la blugs la/
translated: Then, in a sack of jute, hemp, or mouse skin, fill it with white mustard seeds and recite the mantra.

original: dug sna tshhogs pa'i phye ma blugs la rbud pa bya ste grod pa'i kha na mar bud par bya'o//
analyzed: dug sna tshhogs pa'i phye ma blugs la rbud pa bya ste grod pa'i kha na mar bud par bya'o//
translated: Fill it with various poisonous powders and perform the expulsion, opening the sack at the bottom.

original: bdag nyid rdo rje 'dzin par bsam khros pas gnod sbyin nag mo ni/_ra rkyal
analyzed: bdag nyid rdo rje 'dzin par bsam khros pas gnod sbyin nag mo ni/_ra rkyal
translated: The wrathful one imagines a black yakṣiṇī🔽in the belly of a goat-skin bag.

original: nang du bsam bya ste/_/dug gi rkyal pa 'bud par bsam/_/sngags kyi gdug
analyzed: nang du bsam bya ste/_/dug gi rkyal pa 'bud par bsam/_/sngags kyi gdug
translated: Imagine that she is vomiting a bag of poison.🔽Recite this mantra of poison:🔽du du ma ma shag khug

original: pa 'di yang bzlas/_/du du ma ma shag khug_/du sha ma ma mo rol/_du ni ma
analyzed: pa 'di yang bzlas/_/du du ma ma shag khug_/du sha ma ma mo rol/_du ni ma
translated: du sha ma ma mo rol🔽du ni ma ma snying phung🔽sa ma ya srog chod

original: ma snying phyung /_sa ma ya srog chod/_pu sha du ya/_ma ma ti ma du ya/_sha sha
analyzed: ma snying phyung /_sa ma ya srog chod/_pu sha du ya/_ma ma ti ma du ya/_sha sha
translated: pu sha du ya🔽ma ma ti ma du ya🔽sha sha ma ma rbad pu ya🔽ni na ma bhyo hūṃ🔽sod sod

original: ma ma rbad pu ya/_ni na ma blo b+h+yoh sod sod/_ma du ya ma du ya/_tshhal pa rbad
analyzed: ma ma rbad pu ya/_ni na ma blo b+h+yoh sod sod/_ma du ya ma du ya/_tshhal pa rbad
translated: ma du ya ma du ya🔽tshal pa rbad rbad yeng yeng🔽sha thum sha thum rbad

original: rbad yeng yeng /_sha thum sha thum rbad/_mar dur ma dur rbad/_sha bye mang sa
analyzed: rbad yeng yeng /_sha thum sha thum rbad/_mar dur ma dur rbad/_sha bye mang sa
translated: mar dur mar dur rbad🔽sha bye mang sa🔽lo tsa thum ma ya bzlog🔽yakṣi kāli

original: blo/_rtsha thum ma ya bzlog_/yak+shi ka li dgra bo la nad phob/_ces drangs
analyzed: blo/_rtsha thum ma ya bzlog_/yak+shi ka li dgra bo la nad phob/_ces drangs
translated: enemies, send down sickness.🔽Recite this many times.🔽Throw the torma into the northeast corner.

original: mang du bzlas/_gtor ma byang shar 'tshhams su gtang /_/khrag dang grod pa
analyzed: mang du bzlas/_gtor ma byang shar 'tshhams su gtang /_/khrag dang grod pa
translated: Beat the blood and entrails🔽with the skin.🔽Suppress the effigy and name card.

original: khyim la brdeg_/ling ga ming byang gnan pa bya/_/ma mo 'du ba'i dus dag tu/_/
analyzed: khyim la brdeg_/ling ga ming byang gnan pa bya/_/ma mo 'du ba'i dus dag tu/_/
translated: At the time of gathering the mātṛkās,

original: rbud pa dgra bo'i phyogs su rbud/_/'di nyid lo cig byas pa na/_/dgra bo
analyzed: rbud pa dgra bo'i phyogs su rbud/_/'di nyid lo cig byas pa na/_/dgra bo
translated: If this is done for one year, the enemy🔽will be struck down by all kinds of diseases, such as the plague,

original: rbod gri la sogs pa'i/_/nad kyi rigs kun der phab nas/_/ma lus 'chi
analyzed: rbod gri la sogs pa'i/_/nad kyi rigs kun der phab nas/_/ma lus 'chi
translated: and without a doubt will die.

original: bar gdon mi za/_/gnod sbyin mo nag mo yis dgra bo bsad pa'i thabs/
analyzed: bar gdon mi za/_/gnod sbyin mo nag mo yis dgra bo bsad pa'i thabs/
translated: The method of killing the enemy by the Yakshini Krishna.

original: slob dpon las kyi rdo rjes mdzad pa'o//_//
analyzed: slob dpon las kyi rdo rjes mdzad pa'o//_//
translated: Composed by Acharya Karmavajra.🔽It is complete.

original: rdzogs so//_// pan+di ta wa la tshan chen po dang /_lo tsha ba glan chung dar ma tshhul khrims
analyzed: rdzogs so//_// pan+di ta wa la tshan chen po dang /_lo tsha ba glan chung dar ma tshhul khrims
translated: Translated by Pandit Valachanachandra and Lotsawa Gyaltsen Gyatso.🔽The method of killing the enemy by the Yakshini Krishna.🔽Composed by Acharya Karmavajra.

original: kyis bsgyur ba'o//_//
analyzed: kyis bsgyur ba'o//_//
translated: It is complete.

original: ra ba_ _mang_ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ tshho nga khang pa /tshho gyi bya
analyzed: ra ba_ _mang_ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ tshho nga khang pa /tshho gyi bya
translated: Translated by Pandit Valachanachandra and Lotsawa Gyaltsen Gyatso.
